page.title: 05EDUCATION _ WALKERGATE
page.content: Mr Cobb has been headteacher at {Walkergate Junior}for five years.He likes the people but not the building which is about 70 yrs old.He would like to remove the prefabs and gym to make a grassed space.The windows, doors,pipes and ceilings in our{school have been repaired often.There is a big yard which we share with the infants.The school is surrounded by busy roads so Mr Webb,Mr Buzzeo and Mrs Slade are our lollipop people.The Puroh Milk Factory was demolished to make our{Wildlife Garden.}Mr Jones runs a{Leisure Centre}for children twice a week.In addition to the usual lessons, the First,Third and Fourth year children swim at{Byker Swimming {Pool. }
